scripts.test:php: wp-env run tests-cli --env-cwd=wp-content/plugins/plugin composer run test
scripts.test:php:multisite: wp-env run tests-cli --env-cwd=wp-content/plugins/plugin composer run test:multisite
scripts.coverage:php:single: wp-env run tests-cli --env-cwd=wp-content/plugins/plugin composer run coverage:single
scripts.coverage:php:multisite: wp-env run tests-cli --env-cwd=wp-content/plugins/plugin composer run coverage:multisite
scripts.coverage:php:full: wp-env run tests-cli --env-cwd=wp-content/plugins/plugin composer run coverage:full
